item.description: The BioMart community portal: an innovative alternative to large, centralized data repositories Smedley D et al, Nucleic Acids Res. 2015 Jul 1;43(W1):W589-98. flowFit: a Bioconductor package to estimate proliferation in cell-tracking dye studies Rambaldi D, Pece S, Di Fiore PP. Bioinformatics. 2014 Jul 15;30(14):2060-5. FancyGene: dynamic visualization of gene structures and protein domain architectures on genomic loci Rambaldi D, Ciccarelli FD. Bioinformatics. 2009 Sep 1;25(17):2281-2. Low duplicability and network fragility of cancer genes Rambaldi D, Giorgi FM, Capuani F, Ciliberto A, Ciccarelli FD.

Useless Machine was a mobile sandbox game (Unpiblished) MTRandom an alternative Random library for Unity3d designed to generate uniform Pseudo-Random deviates flowFit a Bioconductor package to estimate proliferation in cell-tracking dye studies FancyGene was a tool to generate PDF and PNG images of genes/domains and include them in presentations and papers Splicy aka Gene Chip splice machine, was a tool to store and display original data relatives to single probes mapping over Exons.
